column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was lucky enough to hit up some great Chicago eateries right before the pandemic. I knew coming into the city
column2: a must have was a Chicago deep dish pizza. After lots of research and asking the locals
column3: Lou Malnati's was the most popular choice. Â We only had time for one pizza outing since we had other places to try
column4: so we decided to come here. It was in very close proximity to our hotel and close to the Willis Tower which we did a night visit to. We were seated almost right away in the back room. Service was excellent from start to finish.
